00017 void cMenuItem::draw() {
00018         /*GLfloat matrix[16] = {0};
00019         glGetFloatv(GL_MODELVIEW_MATRIX, matrix);
00020         PrintMatrix(matrix);*/
00021         glPushMatrix();
00022         glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00023         if (active) {
00024                 glColor3f(0.7,0.7,0.7);
00025                 glScalef(1.1, 1.1, 1.1);
00026         } else {
00027                 glColor3f(0.4,0.4,0.4);
00028         }
00029         
00030         if (clicked) {
00031                 glScalef(0.9,0.9,0.9);
00032         }
00033         
00034         if (model == NULL) {
00035                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00036                         glVertex2f(-1, +0.5);
00037                         glVertex2f(+1, +0.5);
00038                         glVertex2f(+1, -0.5);
00039                         glVertex2f(-1, -0.5);
00040                 glEnd();
00041         } else {
00042                 model->Draw();
00043         }
00044         glTranslatef(-0.5, -0.5, 0.1);
00045         glColor3f(1, 0, 0);
00046         glScalef(0.03,0.03,0.03);
00047         font->draw(name.c_str());
00048         glPopMatrix();
00049 }
